hanzi-su-wiki:
笛

Значения

Флейта, дудка

Мнемоника

Дудка с бамбуковым 竹 наконечником. Имеет округлую форму и похожа на фрукт 由.

heisig_chinese_memo: A cool flute made of bamboo sprout.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: flute, clarinet, pipe, whistle, bagpipe, piccolo
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: флейта, кларнет, труба, гудок, волынка, Piccolo
koohiiStory1: Flute is made of bamboo sprout.
koohiiStory2: You pick up your bamboo flute, and recoil in shock as out comes not the dulcet melody you had hoped to play, but rather a Brussels sprout! You play again, and again a Brussels sprout. A bamboo flute that plays sprouts! Fabulous! Puts that golden egg laying goose in its place.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Is there a reason you're in the bamboo grove? Why yes there is. It's so you can get yourself some bamboo and make a flute out of it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine yourself cutting down some bamboo, thinking "this is the reason I'm here, I need a flute, asap!" There is no other reason to be here besides this.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You cut down the bamboo and whittle a flute. You start playing a song. You know the reason why. An alien spacecraft comes flying down and drops a box full of alien tech (てき) in front of you.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You've done what you came to do. You summoned an alien craft with your bamboo flute, gaining some alien tech in the process. Open up the box to see what tech awaits you.
Ru_Meaning: flute, clarinet, pipe, whistle, bagpipe, piccolo
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the reason (由) for the bamboo (⺮) is to make a flute
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A cool flute made of bamboo sprout.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " bamboo " to " flute " sound, the original meaning is wind instrument flute. "Said Wen": "Seven holes. From bamboo, from sound. Qiang flute with three holes." Jin Xiangxiu "Sijiu Fu": "Listen to the generosity of the flute, and the wonderful sound will be found again."

" Flute " also refers to the specific bamboo "flute bamboo" used to make flutes. Tang Bai Juyi "Send Qizhou Zan and the Six Rhymes of Yuan Jiu Yin Inscription": "Flute bamboo comes out of Qichun, frost knife splits Cuiyun."

In modern Chinese, the sharp sounding device is also called " di ", such as "police whistle" and "steam whistle".
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " bamboo " and " flute ", the original meaning is wind instrument flute.
humanum_full_description:
從「竹」，「笛」聲，本義為管樂器笛子。《說文》：「七孔筩也。从竹，由聲。羌笛三孔。」 晉向秀〈思舊賦〉：「聽鳴笛之慷慨兮，妙聲絕而復尋。」

　　「笛」也表示用以製作笛子的特定竹子「笛竹」。唐白居易〈寄蘄州簟與元九因題六韻〉：「笛竹出蘄春，霜刀劈翠筠。」

　　現代漢語中響聲尖銳的發音器也稱為「笛」，如：「警笛」、「汽笛」等。
humanum_short_description: 從「竹」，「笛」聲，本義為管樂器笛子。

笛(ふえ): flute

從「 竹 」，「 笛 」聲，本義為管樂器笛子。《說文》：「七孔筩也。从竹，由聲。羌笛三孔。」 晉向秀〈思舊賦〉：「聽鳴笛之慷慨兮，妙聲絕而復尋。」 「 笛 」也表示用以製作笛子的特定竹子「笛竹」。唐白居易〈寄蘄州簟與元九因題六韻〉：「笛竹出蘄春，霜刀劈翠筠。」 現代漢語中響聲尖銳的發音器也稱為「 笛 」，如：「警笛」、「汽笛」等。
From " bamboo" to " flute" sound, the original meaning is wind instrument flute. "Said Wen": "Seven holes. From bamboo, from sound. Qiang flute with three holes." Jin Xiangxiu "Sijiu Fu": "Listen to the generosity of the flute, and the wonderful sound will be found again." " Flute" also refers to the specific bamboo "flute bamboo" used to make flutes. Tang Bai Juyi "Send Qizhou Zan and the Six Rhymes of Yuan Jiu Yin Inscription": "Flute bamboo comes out of Qichun, frost knife splits Cuiyun." In modern Chinese, the sharp sounding device is also called " di", such as "police whistle" and "steam whistle".

笛字的基本解释

笛
dí
管乐器名，通常是竹制的，有八孔，横着吹奏：笛子。长笛。短笛。笛膜。
响声尖锐的发音器：汽笛。警笛。

笛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dí］
［《廣韻》徒歷切，入錫，定。］
“篴1”的古字。“篴1”的今字。
(1)宙子。
(2)指响声尖锐的发音器。

笛字的英文翻译

◎ 笛
flute

笛字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　笛； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页879第33
【廣韻】徒歷切【集韻】【韻會】亭歷切【正韻】杜歷切，?音狄。七孔筩也。【說文】樂管。亦作篴。【風俗通】武帝時丘仲作笛。笛，滌也。蕩滌邪志，納之雅正。長尺四寸，七孔。【通雅】有雅笛，有羌笛。【馬融·長笛賦】近世雙笛從羌起，羌人伐竹未及已。龍鳴水中不見已，截竹吹之聲相似。剡其上孔通洞之，裁以當簻便易持。易京君明識音律，故本四孔加以一。君明所加孔後出，是謂商聲五音畢。【西京雜記】高祖初入咸陽宮，得玉笛，長二尺三寸，二十六孔。吹之則見車馬山林，隱轔相次，銘曰昭華之琯。【酉陽雜俎】猿臂可爲笛，吹之，聲圓于竹。【韻會小補】樂器圖有義觜笛，謂笛上別安觜也。　又地名。【水經注】洞庭湖之右岸有山，世謂之笛烏頭石。　【正字通】西京玉笛在武帝前，《風俗通》謂笛爲武帝時丘仲所作，誤也。○按《周禮·笙師》已有敎?之文，?與笛同，則周時已有之矣。

考證：〔【說文】樂管，亦作?。〕　謹查?字入本部十一畫，从逐不从遂，今據改篴。
笛字的源字形

笛字的起名意思

：指笛子，管乐器名，竹制；也指响声尖锐的发音器。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　di; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 879 33
[Guang Yun] Tu Liqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Pavilion Liqie [Zheng Yun] Du Liqie,? Yin Di. Seven holes are also. [Speaking text] Music pipe. Also made a slap. [Finality] When Emperor Wu, Qiu Zhong made a flute. Flute, Di also. To cleanse the evil spirits, to accept the Yazheng. Four inches long, seven holes. [Tongya] There are Yadi and Qiangdi. [Ma Rong·Flute Fu] In modern times, the double flute began in Qiang, and it was too late for the Qiang people to cut bamboo. Longming is gone in the water, and the sound of cutting bamboo blowing is similar. It is easy to hold if the upper hole is cut into a hole. Yi Jingjun knows the rhythm of music, so the four holes add one. After the hole added by Junming, it is said that the sound of business has five tones. [Xijing Miscellaneous Notes] Gaozu first entered Xianyang Palace and got a jade flute, two feet three inches long and twenty-six holes. If you blow it, you will see the chariots, horses, mountains and forests, and the inscriptions are called Zhaohua Zhiguan. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】The ape's arm can be a flute, and the sound is rounder than bamboo. [Rhyme will be supplemented] The musical instrument picture has meaning to go to the flute, which means don't be safe on the flute.　Also place name. [Shuijing Note] There is a mountain on the right bank of Dongting Lake, which is known as the flute aconite stone in the world.　【Zhengzitong】The Xijing Yudi was before Emperor Wu. "Fun Sutong" said that the flute was made by Emperor Wu Shiqiuzhong, which was wrong. ○According to "Zhou Li·Sheng Shi", there has been a text, and if it is the same as the flute, it has been in Zhou Shi. ①横吹的管乐器,多用竹子制成,也叫横笛、笛子。2响声

Radicals: 竹, 由  (bamboo, reason)
Meaning Mnemonic
Is there a reason you're in the bamboo grove? Why yes there is. It's so you can get yourself some bamboo and make a flute out of it.
Imagine yourself cutting down some bamboo, thinking "this is the reason I'm here, I need a flute, asap!" There is no other reason to be here besides this.
Reading Mnemonic
You cut down the bamboo and whittle a flute. You start playing a song. You know the reason why. An alien spacecraft comes flying down and drops a box full of alien tech (てき) in front of you.
You've done what you came to do. You summoned an alien craft with your bamboo flute, gaining some alien tech in the process. Open up the box to see what tech awaits you.
